meanings.definition: To clean (something) with a disinfectant in order to destroy bacteria or viruses.
meanings.sent1: She disinfects the kitchen counter every evening to keep it germ-free.
meanings.sent2: The hospital staff disinfects all surfaces regularly to prevent the spread of germs.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was a game when she tried to disinfect its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: His smile disinfects the gloomy room, brightening everyone's mood.
meanings.sent5: The powerful disinfectant spray quickly disinfects any surface it touches.
